galedric.events

Class AsyncEventEmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • galedric.events.EventEmitter
      • galedric.events.AsyncEventEmitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventEmitterInterface

    public class AsyncEventEmitter
extends EventEmitter
    Async event emitter. Unlike a simple EventEmitter, this class uses a thread to perform event distribution. Thus, the call to emit() is non-blocking. This class spawns at most one distribution thread. Thus, even if the emitter doesn't block on emit(), slow event handlers can still induce latency in the whole system by delaying the distribution process.
